title: Did airline passengers miscarriage an inaccurate camera?
subtitle: It is reported that the passengers on board an aircraft who changed their route to Cuba thought that the abduction was a "invisible camera" trick because of the occasional presence of the host of the programme, Alan Font.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The passengers on a plane changed their route to Cuba thought that the kidnapping was an open adventure for the camera because of the occasional presence of the host of the show, Alan Font.
